strstr in c

14 Jul 2015

Source Code

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

#define NOTFOUND -1
int my_strstr(const char * s1, const char * s2) {
    const char * p = s1;
    do {
        if (*p == *s2) { /* match first char */
            const char * p1 = p;
            const char * p2 = s2;
            do 
            {
                if (!*p2) /* FOUND */
                    return p - s1;
                if (!*p1)
                    return NOTFOUND;
            }
            while (*p1++ == *p2++);
        }
    }
    while(*p++);

    return NOTFOUND;
}

int 
main(int argc, char ** argv) 
{
    char s1[] = "skldjfwioeuwetewtsdfsdf";
    char s2[] = "sdfsdf";

    int pos = my_strstr(s1, s2);
    if (pos >= 0) {
        printf("found:%d\n", pos);
    }
    else
        printf("not found!\n");

    exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
}
